title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the equation

Slope at x = 0 is f'(0) = -3

At x = 0, y = 2

y - 2 = -3(x - 0)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer

1 point is earned for the explanation

No, Whether f''(x) changes sign at x = 0 is unknown. The only given value of f''(x) is f''(0) = 0.
